about_the_game: The official soundtrack for Wild West and Wizards transports your mind's eye back to that wide open, dusty landscape where wizards and cowboys become one. Grab a cup of campfire joe and recall your revolver-wielding, fireball blasting adventures through a strange frontier.
detailed_description: The official soundtrack for Wild West and Wizards transports your mind's eye back to that wide open, dusty landscape where wizards and cowboys become one. Grab a cup of campfire joe and recall your revolver-wielding, fireball blasting adventures through a strange frontier.

short_description: This soundtrack contains all of the tracks used within Wild West and Wizards.
